title: Assessing the decarbonization of electricity generation in major emitting countries by 2030 and 2050: Transition to a high share renewable energy mix
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Sandra Chukwudumebi Obiora, Olusola Bamisile, Yihua Hu, Dilber Uzun Ozsahin, Humphrey Adun
